name: Flipside Products 36” x 48” Project Boards for Presentations, Science Fair, School Projects, Event Displays and Trifold Picture Board, Proudly Made in USA - White - 4 Pack
short_description: SCIENCE FAIRS – Trusted by parents, students, and teachers for over 25 years - our presentation project boards have been the backdrop for millions of award-winning science fair projects in schools across the country.

CLASSIC DIMENSIONS – Trifold Poster Board is 36” height; 48” width is the ideal size for all display and presentation projects. When opened center panel measures 22.5” wide, side panels measure 12.75”.

MIXED MEDIA READY – Use this Vision Board to explore endless creative possibilities with paint, markers, crayons, glue and all forms of wet or dry media - our opaque, brightly colored interiors are ready to show off your creative vision and display your research and data.

BEYOND THE CLASSROOM – Economical, quick and versatile project board solution for display needs in commercial settings: ideal for job fairs, tradeshows, special events and promotions for your business.
PLAIN KRAFT REVERSE – Unlike our competitors, no large branding design or logos on the back of our boards.
product_description: Our project display boards allow you to customize and easily create a lasting impression. The durable, smooth, bright color surface has a slight glossy finish that easily allows markers, glue, paint and adhesive. These project boards are great for science fairs, presentations, picture displays, school projects and tabletop exhibits. You can easily transport your project board because of the overlapping side panels. Our project boards have color on one side and natural brown kraft on the back. Made from 1-ply corrugated paper that is 100% recyclable. It measures 36" H x 48" W. Side panels measure 36" H x 12.75" W. Center panel measures 36" H x 22.5" W. Pack of 4 white project boards.
